name: Modern revolutions
description:
submission for week 7 Abertay game development society 48  hour game jam.

4 player local co op shooter where you play in 2 teams blue vs red, playing as revolutionaries of the past you have to take out the other team and avoid dangers in the arena.

Controls:

4 controllers are necessary--- 

left analog to move, 

right analog to aim,  

right trigger to shoot, 

and left trigger to drop grenades after receiving ten damage
